title: I am unable to extract the hidden layer values from Seq2Seq model in Tensorflow for NMt
body_html:
Has anyone tried to extract the hidden layer values since the code explicitly doesn't specify the hidden layer in translate.py or in seq2seq_model.py. ?

tensorflow version: 1.0
OS : CentOS
Python: 2.7

Is there any other program i need to look into for printing the hidden layer values?
